Project Proponent: AAK PUUL NGANTAM LTD. and Balkanu Cape York Development Corporation Pty Ltd
Project Name: Savanna Burning Investment Ready Project - Cape York Pilot Aurukun
Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project involves the strategic and planned burning of savanna areas during the early dry season to reduce the risk of late dry season wild fires.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
211/SP241404 



This project is in the Aurukun local government area.
Name of person/s to whom the KACCUs issu: Aak Puul Ngantam Ltd., Balkanu Cape York Development Corporation Pty Ltd
Notes:
29/03/2017 Variation of project method - From the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reduction of Greenhouse Gas Emissions through Early Dry Season Savanna Burning - 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013 to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015

11/04/2018 Variation to participant name - from Balkanu Cape York Development Corporation Pty Ltd to Balkanu Cape York Development Corporation Pty Ltd and Aak Puul Ngantam Ltd

28/05/2020 This project was contracted in Nov-15 and CAC102439 has now been completed
